analyzed: atha ātmavatām matvā vā sva adhikāram su duṣkaram
yateran natmavat tāyai deśika ādyāḥ jigīṣavaḥ
tadā ātmavat tvam yogi tvam jita akṣasya upapadyate
prāṇāyāma ādi anuṣṭhānāt jita akṣa tvam śanais śanais

original: japaḥ samādhirityaṅgāny aṅgī yogo 'ṣṭamaḥ svayam // MT_4.3 //
analyzed: japaḥ samādhiḥ iti aṅgāni aṅgī svayam
prāṇaḥ prāc uditaḥ vāyuḥ āyāmaḥ sya prakhedanam
preraṇa ākṛṣṭi saṃrodha lakṣaṇam kratu doṣa nud
tatas sukha lava āsvāde teṣām vṛttasya cetasaḥ
pratyāhāraḥ vidhātavyaḥ sarvatas vinivartanam
tena indriya artha saṃsarga vinivṛtteḥ citaḥ matiḥ
dhāraṇā yogya tām eti pade sva icchā prakalpite
cintā tad viṣayā dhyānam tat ca ādiṣṭam muhur muhur
tad ekatāna tām eti sa samādhiḥ vidhīyate
japaḥ tad bhāṣaṇam dhyeya saṃmukhīkaraṇam mune
ūhaḥ bhivīkṣaṇam vastu vikalpa anantara uditaḥ

original: yadā vetti padaṃ heyam upādeyaṃ ca tatsthiteḥ /
analyzed: yadā vetti padam heyam upādeyam ca tad sthiteḥ

original: tatpoṣakaṃ vipakṣaṃ ca yacca tatpoṣakaṃ param // MT_4.9 //
analyzed: tat poṣakam vipakṣam ca yat ca tat poṣakam param
eṣu vyasta samasteṣu kṛta yatnasya yoginaḥ

original: vibhānti śaktayo viśvaṃ vyāpya bhānoriva tviṣaḥ // MT_4.10 //
analyzed: vibhānti śaktayaḥ viśvam vyāpya bhānoḥ iva tviṣaḥ
na tam īṣṭe naraḥ kaścid rakṣaḥ dānava mānavāḥ
rorucānam atītya etān dṛkkriyā prāṇa rociṣā
nivṛtteḥ manasaḥ hetuḥ saṃsargāt prāṇa khedanam
nivṛttiḥ dhāraṇā ādīnām mūlam sarvasya tat tatas
vistareṇa suraśreṣṭha viprakṛṣṭam ca yat sthitam
yat anyat sādhanam kiṃcid yoga siddheḥ ca kathyatām
na śakyam vistarāt vaktum tad prasaṅga bhayāt vidheḥ
praśnasya avaśya vācya tvāt tathā api uddeśaḥ ucyate
mūtra ādi utsṛjya vidhivat eka ardha daśa saptabhiḥ
mṛdbhiḥ liṅga guda asavya hasta yugmāni śaucayet
dvis vratī tris apaḥ pītvā dvis vimṛjya ānanam spṛśet
sva bāhu nābhi hṛtkāni dvis tris vā
hita jīrṇa aśana svasthaḥ tri kuḍya āveṣṭite gṛhe

original: bādhāśūnye vanādau vā svāsanastha udaṅmukhaḥ // MT_4.17 //
analyzed: bādhā śūnye vana ādau vā sva āsana sthaḥ udak mukhaḥ
namaskṛtya maheśānam umā skanda gaṇa adhipān
ṛju grīvā śiraḥ vakṣāḥ nāsā agra āhita dṛś dvayaḥ
pārṣṇibhyām vṛṣaṇau rakṣan dantaiḥ dantān a saṃspṛśan
viṣṭabha dehaḥ danta agre jihvām ādāya susthitaḥ
recayet śakti paryantam puṭena ekena mārutam
sa recakaḥ tad abhyāsāt vedha vikṣipta karmasu
kramaśas śakta tām eti vikṛṣṭa viṣayeṣu api
bāhyena vāyunā mūrteḥ śakti sīma prapūraṇam
pūrakaḥ sa tad abhyāsāt su guru api vikarṣayet

original: tyāgasaṃgrahaṇe hitvā nirodhaḥ kumbhakaḥ smṛtaḥ // MT_4.22 //
analyzed: tyāga saṃgrahaṇe hitvā nirodhaḥ kumbhakaḥ smṛtaḥ
rodha śaktiḥ tad abhyāsāt vyaktim eti anivāri tā
tathā asya carataḥ vidvān soma sūrya īśa vartmasu
tad dharma yogyatām buddhvā yogī saṃsādhayet matam

original: pūrakaṃ kumbhakaṃ vāpi bhajeccandrapathi sthite // MT_4.24 //
analyzed: pūrakam kumbhakam vā api bhajet candra pathi sthite
puṣṭi mṛtyu jaya ādi artham sva ātmanaḥ nyasya recakam
stobha unmāda viṣa uddīpti pramukheṣu tu recakam
dhyāna arcana japa ādyeṣu dehatyāge ca śāṅkare
kumbhakaḥ recakaḥ ca iṣṭaḥ dīkṣā saṃsthāpaneṣu ca

original: yavīyān madhyamo jyeṣṭhaḥ sa tālairdvādaśādibhiḥ // MT_4.27 //
analyzed: yavīyān madhyamaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa tālaiḥ dvādaśa ādibhiḥ
tālaḥ dvādaśabhiḥ jānu pariṇāha paribhramaiḥ
saḥ pi dhyāna japa upetaḥ sagarbhaḥ nyasta dujjhitaḥ

original: yathā sagarbhaḥ sthairyāya manaso na tathetaraḥ /
analyzed: yathā sagarbhaḥ sthairyāya manasaḥ na tathā itaraḥ

original: prātarniśākṛtaṃ pāpaṃ dinānte ca divākṛtam // MT_4.29 //
analyzed: prātar niśā kṛtam pāpam dina ante ca divā kṛtam
devānām pracala tvam pradhāvatām

original: snāto bhavati tīrtheṣu sarvakratuṣu dīkṣitaḥ // MT_4.30 //
analyzed: snātaḥ bhavati tīrtheṣu sarva kratuṣu dīkṣitaḥ
potar pitṝṇām yaḥ śaśvat sagarbham imam ācaret
dhyāyet adhva anta gam devam japet tad vācakam sadā
kṣiti ādīni atha tattvāni tad rūpa adhikṛtāni vā
yasmāt na acetanam tattvam siddham api upakārakam
śaivam vapuḥ iti dhyāyet atas yat yat samīhitam
siddhaye dhāraṇā ādīnām vṛttīnām anilasya ca
sagarbham kumbhakam vidvān ātiṣṭhet avikhinna dhīḥ
ayam arka guṇam kālam kṛta citta vyavasthitiḥ
prāpnoti dhāraṇā śabdam dhāraṇā siddhi dānataḥ
sthiti arthaḥ dhāraṇā śabdaḥ sthāna arthaḥ u pi upacārataḥ
sthānam prāthamikasya imān yavanī ādīni na itarat
tāni hema hima jyotiḥ kṛṣṇa svacchāni rūpataḥ
vedi ardha maṇḍala tri astra vṛtta padma ākṛtīni tu
sthairya āpyāyana viploṣa preraṇā śūnyatā āptaye
bhavanti vajraka jvālāḥ bindu śūnya anvitāni tu
bādhakāni anuvartīni madhyasthāni avagatya ca
yogī vyasta samastāni bibhṛyāt iṣṭa siddhaye

original: kva deśe dhāraṇārūpaṃ cintanīyaṃ vipaścitā // MT_4.39 //
analyzed: kva deśe dhāraṇā rūpam cintanīyam vipaścitā

original: kiṃ ca vyastasamastānāṃ phalaṃ brūhi sureśvara /
analyzed: kim ca vyasta samastānām phalam brūhi sureśvara
hṛdi cetasi vikṣipte dhārayet kṣitim artha vid
jalam pipāsitaḥ kaṇṭhe mande gnau jaṭhare nalam
prāṇa ādi vṛtti siddhi artham hṛd kaṇṭha ādiṣu mārutam
viṣa ādi abhibhave vyoma teṣu yatra upayoga vat

original: khaṃ samasteṣu bhūteṣu vārivāyū śikhikṣitī // MT_4.42 //
analyzed: kham samasteṣu bhūteṣu vāri vāyū śikhi kṣitī
vāri agnī bhūmi pavanau vāri kṣme anala anilau
madhyastha arāti mitrāṇi catuṣke yugma yugmaśas
parijñāya iti matimān yojayet iṣṭa siddhaye
kāni prāṇa ādi vṛttīnām sthānāni asmin śarīrake

original: jitāsu tāsu kiṃ ca syād iti brūhi surottama /
analyzed: jitāsu tāsu kim ca syāt iti brūhi sura uttama
tasya hṛd nābhi uraḥ kaṇṭha pṛṣṭha deśeṣu dhāraṇāt
jayaḥ praṇayana ādīnām vṛttīnām yoginaḥ bhavet
jita praṇayanaḥ dhatte sva icchayā deham ātmanaḥ
jita apanayanaḥ śnāti śakṛt ādi jahāti na
vijita unnayanaḥ bhyeti vāc vaśi tva ādikān guṇān
bhavet tyakta jaraḥ vaśī
vapuḥ vihāra vaśitā bhavet vinamane jite
paṅka ambu kaṇṭaka āsaṅgaḥ vīryam akṣayam adbhutam
dhāraṇāḥ dvādaśa dhyānam divya āloka pravṛtti dam
samādhi raṇima ādīnām dvādaśa etāni kāraṇam

original: prāṇāyāmaṃ vināpyevaṃ vaśyātmā cetasi sthitaḥ // MT_4.50 //
analyzed: prāṇāyāmam vinā api evam vaśya ātmā cetasi sthitaḥ
samabhyasyan avāpnoti guṇān ukta an anantaram
yat yat vastu yathoddiṣṭa krama yogāt prapadyate
tatra cit vyaktiḥ tad vyāpti viṣayā bhavet

original: iti bāhye sthite sarvam ākalayya svacakṣuṣā // MT_4.52 //
analyzed: iti bāhye sthite sarvam ākalayya sva cakṣuṣā
sarvān pad arthān saṃtyajya śivatattvam samabhyaset
śiva garbhān samātiṣṭhan prāṇāyāma ādikān api

original: jahāti janturyaḥ prāṇān sa śivatvaṃ prapadyate /
analyzed: jahāti jantuḥ yaḥ prāṇān sa śiva tvam prapadyate

original: rūpaṃ paraṃ maheśasya dhyātuṃ śakyaṃ na jātucit // MT_4.54 //
analyzed: rūpam param maheśasya dhyātum śakyam na jātucit
vaicitryāt kalpitam bhrāntyai tatra āsthā cetasaḥ katham

original: pārthivāpye vicitrāṅke na dhyeye dhāraṇe tadā // MT_4.55 //
analyzed: pārthiva āpye vicitra aṅke na dhyeye dhāraṇe tadā
tathā api abhyāsataḥ siddhāḥ śrūyante yoginaḥ tayoḥ
bhoga vipluta cittasya katham syāt citta saṃsthitiḥ
na adhikṛtya avirakta aṇūn prāha idam sādhanam haraḥ
śakyate viṣayīkartum jagat api akhilam śanais
kimu citram vapuḥ dāntaiḥ vairāgya abhyāsa śālibhiḥ
kā iyam vā rūpaka iyat tā sarva adhiṣṭhāna yoginaḥ
sarvadā sarva bhūtānām sarva ākāra upakāriṇaḥ
sthāna rūpa pramāṇāni parikalpya sva cetasā
yatra uparamate cittam tat tat dhyeyam punar punar

original: tenāsya cetasaḥ sthairyaṃ saviśeṣaguṇaḥ śanaiḥ // MT_4.60 //
analyzed: tena asya cetasaḥ sthairyam sa viśeṣa guṇaḥ śanais
unmīlya yoga saṃskāram hata vighnasya jāyate
evam ātiṣṭhataḥ samyak vinā eva ākāra kalpanām
a kiñcid cintakasya asya rūpam unmīlati svakam
sarva artha dṛkkriyā rūpam ānandam avyayam
yat prāpya na punar duḥkha yogam eti aśiva āvaham
etat samasta guhyānām guhyam siddha amara stutam
sākṣāt ālocanam śambhoḥ atyutpāvanam uttamam
na alpa kāla uṣitāya etat deyam na ati pramādine
na amedhine na atapase yaḥ ca na abhyarcayet śivam
asya abhyāsāt divya siddhi aṃśu jālaiḥ iṣṭān lokān rorucānaḥ vihṛtya
kāle hitvā apāsravam deham āste sva ātmani eva āścarya caryā adhivāsaḥ
